p: The applicant provided the full characterisation of the volatile constituents in 10 batches obtained by gas chromatography coupled with mass spectrometry (GC‐MS). 17 In total, up to 88 constituents were detected, 71 of which were identified and accounted on average for 99.7% (99.5–99.9%) of the GC area. Besides the seven compounds indicated in the product specifications, 13 other compounds were detected at individual levels > 0.1% and are listed in Table 3. These 20 compounds together account on average for 99.0% (98.4–99.3%) of the GC area. The remaining volatile 51 compounds (ranging between 0.002% and 0.1% and accounting together for < 1%) are listed in the footnote. 18
